=================================================

Professor Marcus du Sautoy explores why we are driven to measure and quantify the world around us and why we have reduced the universe to just a handful of fundamental units of measurement.

1/3 Professor Marcus du Sautoy explores measurement by looking at the metre and the second.

2/3 Exploring the history of the world's master kilogramme and the race to replace it.

3/3 How we came to measure and harness the power of heat, light and electricity.
